feed.title: UpSnap Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.3.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Thanks for 2k+ stars!

Notable changes this release:

  • üê≥ Docker images are now also available on docker hub (looking at you Synology users üëÄ)
  • üì± New PWA support
  • üïê New human readable cron expression (thanks @studiojw)
  • üêõ Fixed an issue where the countdown would not show after opening the site for the first time
  • üêõ Fixed an issue with cron jobs now working correctly when lazy ping is enabled
  • üñºÔ∏è Your custom favicon now shows on the login page

Changelog

Features

  • a2b43f6dec1a8347a9a8b52427486b01ceb45e8d: feat: add pwa manifest (@seriousm4x)
  • fb5ef85a74597253baa5c096ab62e106fb2aa4cc: feat: show custom favicon on login page (@seriousm4x)
  • 4a9d1c02b679a9198e3365c86e8560eb25c7841a: feat: add function to format next cron execution time as relative string (@studiojw)
  • 2d44d96af876fb16eeca82ea6abb2a95dabfdfea: feat: sync docker images to dockerhub and ghcr (@seriousm4x)

Bug fixes

  • 1672ad73fa7f9b2501b8b89149c1353f3930a896: fix: timer not turning yellow when clicking #757 (@seriousm4x)
  • 16379da2b541980028c81119f8749a867bad111e: fix: don't rely on db device status for cron #669 (@seriousm4x)
  • e3259b1574922b9b9d9639e4148a6d42e12002a6: fix: update cron text reactively (@seriousm4x)
  • f0aea1b2bc14ddf7146664feebd5e2bc2aa12d2e: fix: another attempt at fixing #669 (@seriousm4x)
  • 83aac0c2b8651abb9727531539e5722480fe0648: fix: pointer issue for device in cron #669 (@seriousm4x)
  • 53962db94efff09e71afbcb0d08a9e985eb67dda: fix: add goreleaser version to yaml (@seriousm4x)
  • 8f2c270fda028f543dcb8a1e31667354d8225289: fix: replace spaces in ip, mac and netmask, close #696 (@seriousm4x)
  • d41d256c77d397a9eaa8082e364fea21c7729fd4: fix: update $settingsPub store after register (@seriousm4x)
  • 8f2c270fda028f543dcb8a1e31667354d8225289: fix: replace spaces in ip, mac and netmask, close #696 (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies
